name: Chem Class
description:
Controls:

PC - WASD or Arrow keys to move, interact, and advance dialogue 

Mobile - Swipe anywhere to move and interact, tap to advance dialogue

----------------

A year spent with close to a hundred people, each with their own thoughts, priorities, needs and qualities. They spend the year learning about the universe, while the teacher learns about a lot of teenagers.

This "game" is a yearbook for a totally fictional high school chemistry class. The teacher is most certainly not me, because they are fictional, and the students are so incredibly fictional that even if they did resemble a real human being or their mannerisms, they would be given an alias.

The music was written by one of these totally fictional students too.
